snippet: The Lions greeted the men’s basketball season on Friday with an 11 a.m. game amid excitement that they can make the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 1968.
abstract: Columbia defeats Kean, 107-62, in men's college basketball season opener.
lead_paragraph: The Lions greeted the men’s basketball season on Friday with an 11 a.m. game amid excitement that they can make the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 1968.

headline.print_headline: Columbia Rises for Opener and Quickly Shines
headline.main: Columbia Rises for Opener and Quickly Shines
